title: tinyteapot
author: tinyteapot
content: Dear community,I was privileged to receive this token and i feel like sharing with other people, we never can tell what tomorrow will be.The token is flagged by coinmarketcap https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/jumpn but the data is still showing, i advise you understand it before requesting for it.I already have close to $500,000 usd  value of the token in my wallet and i feel is huge for me to hold as an individual.Trading of the token is technical but i can see it been traded on dextool with warning https://www.dextools.io/app/bnb/pair-explorer/0x1f7a58dfc81e6b8ce5767e26ef90a9d4e12f62c7I have decided to distribute $200, 000 out of my over $500, 000 usd value of the token.Useful information about the project website - https://jumpn.todaycoinmarketcap - https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/jumpn/exchange - https://www.dextools.io/app/bnb/pair-explorer/0x1f7a58dfc81e6b8ce5767e26ef90a9d4e12f62c7                https://pancakeswap.finance/Contract address - https://bscscan.com/token/0xEE6cacDDd3A9370d87dB581EE6728226883578e5my wallet holding the JST token - https://bscscan.com/address/0xa5ab89c988163468693b85b379a17b8830996b4aHow to request1, Send me PM or post here with your bep20 wallet address.2, Send transaction gas fees to the wallet above - 0xa5ab89c988163468693b85b379A17B8830996B4A3, Gas fees is 0.01 BNB4, $100 in value of JST shall be sent to the address where the BNB gas came from.5, I will only give $100 per wallet address.Thank you.

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Why is it the tokens arent showing on the wallet itself but seen on the transaction history? If this is true then your a very generous guy. I am just curious why would you send a $100 worth of jst per wallet and asked us to give 0.01bnb for the transaction.Quote from: tinyteapot on July 27, 2022, 08:51:30 PMI was privileged to receive this token and i feel like sharing with other people, we never can tell what tomorrow will be.Is this an airdrop? Or form of payment for such services? Im not saying its not real but its kinda shady actually. Its much better if youll convert some of those jst to bnb to cover for transaction and send jst tokens to whoever will post their bnb wallet here. That way, it could be less suspicious. If your goal is really to share that wealth of yours. Just a suggestion mate.Dont get me wrong, the idea of sending gas fee to others and will give you reward is indeed a modus of some scammers. I just giving you a suggestion to distribute it without much issue like most scammers there.

comments.author: tinyteapot
comments.body: In response to the comments above.william butler yeats poem when you are oldIs now $800,000 too much for an individual.

comments.author: tinyteapot
comments.body: Update,No one should send any BNB to the wallet address.The project is a confirmed scam.
